PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2021-09662021-11-26TC,  ,  ,  ,  , 
ActRailway Safety Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Grade Crossings Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the GRADE CROSSINGS REGULATIONS in order to (1) revise the scope of application of the Regulations by setting requirements for grade crossings according a risk-based model; and (2) extend the compliance deadline for upgrade requirements until November 28, 2022 for existing crossings considered to be high priority, and until November 28, 2024 for all other existing crossings that do not meet the threshold criteria for low-risk or high priority.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2021-0233 Publication Date: 2021-12-08
AttachmentsAttachment
